body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #18541 (rpc: Make verifychain default values static, not depend on global args by MarcoFalke)
* #18495 (rpc: Remove deprecated migration code by vasild)
* #18467 (rpc: Improve documentation and return value of settxfee by fjahr)
* #18453 (rpc, cli: add multiwallet balances rpc, use it in -getinfo, no longer depend on getwalletinfo balance by jonatack)
* #18448 (rpc: fix/add missing RPCExamples for "Util" RPCs by theStack)
* #18202 (refactor: consolidate sendmany and sendtoaddress code by Sjors)
* #17954 (wallet: Remove calls to Chain::Lock methods by ryanofsky)
* #17693 (rpc: Add generateblock to mine a custom set of transactions by andrewtoth)
* #17579 ([refactor] Merge getreceivedby tally into GetReceived function by andrewtoth)
* #16528 (Native Descriptor Wallets using DescriptorScriptPubKeyMan by achow101)
* #16377 ([rpc] don't automatically append inputs in walletcreatefundedpsbt by Sjors)
* #16365 (Log RPC parameters (arguments) if -debug=rpcparams by LarryRuane)
* #15494 (rpc: Return whether the block was invalidated on invalidateblock by promag)
* #12674 (RPC: Support addnode onetry without making the connection priviliged by luke-jr)
* #11413 ([wallet] [rpc] sendtoaddress/sendmany: Add explicit feerate option by kallewoof)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

<!--cf906140f33d8803c4a75a2196329ecb-->
ð This pull request conflicts with the target branch and [needs rebase](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#rebasing-changes).
